item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes üöÄ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Epigenomics in crops I am a postdoctoral researcher in the Springer Lab at the University of Minnesota. The guiding paradigm for my research is understanding the contribution of epigenetics to heritable phenotypic variation in crop plants. Epigenetics refers to the heritable transmission of information that is not solely due to DNA sequence. My goal is to understand the role of epigenetics in trait variation in plants and learning when, how and why epigenetic traits (‚Äúepialleles‚Äù) can be passed through cell divisions to daughter cells or across generations.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section.
